_sText:
Combine and rebels have been Constantly Fighting Between this Narrow Valley Near City 20 Which disappeared 5 years before Gordon Freeman Was called to fight From G-Man.

A scout of rebels and combine fighting to secure the Abandened Base but while travelling there an Infected had Infected one of the Combine. Knowing that they would become a zombie The escape is on!

They Must go to the Abandened Base or Die!

What This Features!

An optional Pathway to be able to play Music !! 

Defend the Teleport!

Half Life 2 Type Escape Map 


Next Release is out !

Motor way is now made 

SchoolBus is made 

Better Functionality 

Fun? you decide
